scripts.build: tsc && yarn delete && vite build && yarn create_dist
scripts.create_dist: yarn prepare_dist && yarn prepare_version && yarn copy_assets
scripts.prepare_dist: cpx versions.json dist && cpx manifest.json dist/v24_0
scripts.copy_assets: cpx 'src/assets/*' dist/v24_0/assets && cpx 'build/assets/*' dist/v24_0/assets && cpx 'src/Addins/*' dist/v24_0
